amendatorysection.catchline: Repealed. Laws 2018, LB377, § 87. Operative date January 1, 2019. Class I school district; district elections or meetings; voice vote; challenge.
amendatorysection.para: When a vote on any question is taken in any other manner than by ballot, a challenge under section 79-540 immediately after the vote has been taken and previous to an announcement of the vote by the chair shall be deemed to be made when offering to vote and treated in the same manner. An oath shall be taken and reduced to writing as provided in such section.
